Package org.example.service

Interface EmployeeService<T extends Employee>

Type Parameters:
T - The type, that is either an Employee or its child, for which the service is used.
All Known Subinterfaces:
AccountService<T>, EngineerService, HODService, UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
EngineerServiceImpl, HODServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl
public interface EmployeeService<T extends Employee>

Interface EmployeeService

This interface is used to declare the methods that are common between:
  • HODService
  • EngineerService
  • UserService
  • AccountService

  • Method Details

    • changeForename

      void changeForename(String email, byte[] password, String newForename) throws NotFoundException, AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException
      Changes the forename of an employee if authorized and authenticated.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      newForename - The new forename of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee is not found
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized to do the task

    • changeSurname

      void changeSurname(String email, byte[] password, String newSurname) throws NotFoundException, AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException
      Changes the surname of an employee if authorized and authenticated.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      newSurname - The new surname of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee is not found
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized to do the task

      void updateAddress(String email, byte[] password, Address oldAddress, Address newAddress) throws NotFoundException, AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException
      Updates the address of an employee if authorized and authenticated.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      oldAddress - The old address of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      newAddress - The new address of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee is not found
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized to do the task

      void removeAddress(String email, byte[] password, Address address) throws NotFoundException, AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException

      Parameters:
